about_the_game:
Kenny 7 is a scifi shooter game.

In the near future, machines have taken over the world.
Every 5 years, new models are produced that are always more advanced and more efficient.
The old models are either reconditioned, upgraded or destroyed because they are considered too obsolete.
However, some of the Kenny_7 models whose AI has failed over the years have risen up against the established order.
You are one of them.
You will fight multiples kind of ennemies in fast and fierce fights where only your reflexes will save the day.
Discover multiples bonus that will increase your gun and increase your speed.
